languages.text: "Свет... пропал. Это был он? Последний восход? Но почему все произошло иначе, чем обещал учитель?" {n}Заря слепо вертит головой. Теперь ее голос — голос обычной женщины средних лет, испуганный и полный боли.{/n} "Ты заплатишь за это. Заплатишь. За..." {n}Тело женщины обмякает и рушится на пол, железная маска с глухим ударом бьется о пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Свет... пропал. Это был он? Последний восход? Но почему все произошло иначе, чем обещал учитель?" {n}Заря слепо вертит головой. Теперь ее голос — голос обычной женщины средних лет, испуганный и полный боли.{/n} "Ты заплатишь за это. Заплатишь. За..." {n}Тело женщины обмякает и рушится на пол, железная маска с глухим ударом бьется о пол.{/n}

languages.text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Свет... пропал. Это был он? Последний восход? Но почему все произошло иначе, чем обещал учитель?" {n}Заря слепо вертит головой. Теперь ее голос — голос обычной женщины средних лет, испуганный и полный боли.{/n} "Ты заплатишь за это. Заплатишь. За..." {n}Тело женщины обмякает и рушится на пол, железная маска с глухим ударом бьется о пол.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why so different from how our teacher had promised it would happen?" {n}Aurora turns her head about blindly. Her voice is now the voice of a common middle-aged woman, frightened and pained.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses on the floor. Her iron mask hits the floor with a dull thud.{/n}

Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

languages.text: "Das Licht ... ist fort. War sie das? Die Letzte Dämmerung? Aber warum war sie so anders, als unser Lehrer es versprochen hat?" {n}Aurora schüttelt blind den Kopf. Ihre Stimme nun die einer ganz gewöhnlichen Frau mittleren Alters, verängstigt und gepeinigt.{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen. Das werdet Ihr. Ihr-" {n}Der Körper der Frau wird plötzlich schlaff und sie sackt zusammen. Ihre eiserne Maske schlägt mit einem dumpfen Knall auf dem Boden auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das Licht ... ist fort. War sie das? Die Letzte Dämmerung? Aber warum so ganz anders, als unsere Lehrer es uns versprochen haben?" {n}Aurora schüttelt blind den Kopf. Ihre Stimme nun die einer ganz gewöhnlichen Frau mittleren Alters, verängstigt und gepeinigt.{/n} "Dafür werdet Ihr bezahlen. Das werdet Ihr. Ihr-" {n}Der Körper der Frau wird plötzlich schlaff und sie sackt zusammen. Ihre eiserne Maske schlägt mit einem dumpfen Knall auf dem Boden auf.{/n}

languages.text: « La lumière... n'est plus. Serait-ce la fin ? L'Aube finale... Pourquoi est-elle si différente de ce que nous a promis notre mentor ? » {n}Aurore secoue la tête d'un air stupéfait. Sa voix est désormais celle d'une femme entre deux âges, apeurée et triste.{/n} « Vous me le paierez, oh oui ! Vous... » {n}Le corps de la femme s'effondre mollement. Son masque de fer frappe le sol dans un bruit sourd.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « La lumière... n'est plus. Serait-ce la fin ? L'Aube finale... Pourquoi cela ne s'est-il pas passé conformément aux promesses de notre mentor ? » {n}Aurore secoue la tête d'un air stupéfait. Sa voix est désormais celle d'une femme entre deux âges, apeurée et triste.{/n} « Vous me le paierez, oh oui ! Vous... »{n}Le corps de la femme s'effondre mollement. Son masque de fer frappe le sol dans un bruit sourd.{/n}

languages.text: “光芒……消失了。这是怎么回事？这就是终末黎明吗？可为什么和我们导师的承诺截然不同？”{n}“极光”迷茫地摇着头。她的声音听起来仅仅是个再普通不过的中年妇女，充满了恐惧与痛苦。{/n}“你必将会为此付出代价。你一定会，你——”{n}女人的身体瘫软在地板上，铁面具重重地砸在地上，发出一声闷响。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “光芒……消失了。这是怎么回事？这就是终末黎明？为什么与我们导师的承诺截然不同？”{n}“极光”迷茫地摇着头，声音变回了中年妇女的声音，充满了恐惧与痛苦。{/n}“你必将会为此付出代价。你一定会，你——”{n}女人的身体瘫软在地板上，铁面具重重地砸在地上，发出一声闷响。{/n}

languages.text: 「光が…消えた。あれは…？最後の夜明け？しかし、師が約束した事態とこれほど違うのは何故だ？」{n}オーロラは我を失って頭を振る。その声は今や、怯えて苦しむただの中年女性の声になっていた。{/n}「この代償は払ってもらう。貴様にだ。貴様…」{n}女の体は力を失い、床に倒れ込む。鉄仮面が鈍い音を立てて地面に落ちた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「光が…消えた。あれは…？最後の夜明け？しかし、師が約束した事態とこれほど違うのは何故だ？」{n}オーロラは我を失って頭を振る。その声は今や、怯えて苦しむただの中年女性の声になった。{/n}「この代償は払ってもらう。貴様がだ。貴様…」{n}女の体は力を失い、床に倒れ込む。鉄仮面が鈍い音を立てて床を叩いた。{/n}

languages.text: «La luz... se ha ido. ¿Era eso? ¿El Amanecer Final? Pero, ¿por qué era tan diferente a lo que nuestro mentor prometía?». {n}Aurora niega con la cabeza. Su voz es ahora la de una mujer corriente de mediana edad, asustada y dolorida.{/n} «Pagarás por esto. Lo harás. Tú...» {n}El cuerpo de la mujer se queda inerte y se desploma. Su máscara de hierro golpea el suelo con un golpe seco.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «La luz... se ha ido. ¿Era eso? ¿El Amanecer Final? Pero, ¿por qué es tan diferente a lo que nuestro mentor había prometido que ocurriría?». {n}Aurora niega con la cabeza. Su voz es ahora la de una mujer normal de mediana edad, asustada y dolorida.{/n} «Pagarás por esto. Lo harás. Tú...» {n}El cuerpo de la mujer se queda inerte y se desploma en el suelo. Su máscara de hierro golpea el suelo con un golpe seco.{/n}

languages.text: "Işık... Kayboldu. Bu kadar mıydı? Nihai Şafak bu mu? İyi de hocamızın bize vadettiğinden niye bu kadar farklı?" {n}Aurora, başını körlemesine sallıyor. Sesi, orta yaşlı, sıradan bir kadınınkine dönüşüyor. Korktuğu ve acı çektiği aşikâr.{/n} "Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksin. Ödeyeceksin. Sen..." {n}Kadının bedeni, cansızlaşıp olduğu yere yığılıyor. Demir maskesi, tok bir sesle zemine çarpıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The light... is gone. Was that it? The Final Dawn? But why was it so different from what our teacher promised?" {n}Aurora shakes her head blindly. Her voice is now the voice of an ordinary middle-aged woman, frightened and in pain.{/n} "You will pay for this. You will. You—" {n}The woman's body goes limp and collapses to the floor. Her iron mask hits the ground with a dull thud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Işık... Kayboldu. Bu kadar mıydı? Nihai Şafak bu mu? Neden bize öğretilenden bu kadar farklı oldu?" {n}Aurora, başını kontrolsüzce iki yana sallıyor. Sesi, orta yaşlı, sıradan bir kadınınkine dönüşüyor. Korktuğu ve acı çektiği aşikâr.{/n} "Bunun bedelini ödeyeceksiniz. Ödeyeceksiniz. Siz..." {n}Kadının bedeni, cansızlaşıp olduğu yere yığılıyor. Demir maskesi, güm sesi çıkararak zeminle buluşuyor.{/n}
